name: Box RPG
description:
Embark on an epic adventure across the Box world!

(well atleast i think it's epic idk)

the world has been infested with mutant boxes and you'll be the one to take care of them!

this game will include:

  • a story campaign
  • battles with formidable foes
  • many minigames
  • and more! find out yourself, nerd
credits:

Toni57 - art, coding, music, writing, concepts and everything else

IzFrik - beta tester, feedback giver and additional ideas

Teo & Bree - additional ideas and early exporting help
